about:
Hello there, My name is **Yarden Mathieson**!


 Full Stack Developer with knowledge and experience writing single-page applications using the latest WEB technologies such as React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Redux, and VueX. 
 With a combination of strong visual design skills. 

 A team player, hard worker, focusing on problem-solving and detailed orientation, self-learner, responsible, and adapt quickly to a new environment.
